Session 2024-12-07-002

Summary: Discussed guitar tone and effects for the new track.

Conversation Details

Session Type

Music Discussion

Tags

  • guitar tone

Conversation

User: What plugins would best replicate Luis Ortiz’s guitar tone?
Assistant: Using the iZotope Trash plugin with a mid-heavy EQ setting would emulate his tone.
User: Should we layer reverb to add depth to the bridge?
Assistant: Layering reverb could work well, but let’s ensure it doesn’t muddy the mix.

Outcomes

  • Decided on effects chain for the bridge.
